subject: You will received your ATM c
body:
You will received your ATM card package by next week you should understand that you will pay
for the activation of the card Mr. Peter

subject: Re:   You will received your ATM c
body:
Hello Mr. Peter,

Thank you for your message. I'm really excited to receive my ATM card package next week! Just to clarify, could you please explain more about the activation process? How much will it cost and how can I make the payment? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Theresa
